array.string: <b:t>There are 100cm in 1 metre. Fill in the gaps.</b:t>
<b:on number="100" suffix=" centimetres"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="1" suffix=" metre"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="700" suffix=" cm"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="7" suffix=" metres"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="400" suffix=" cm"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="4" suffix=" metres"/>
<b:on number="300" suffix=" cm"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="3" suffix=" metres"/>
